questions.stem: Which UK-based firm projected India to become the world’s second-largest economy by PPP by 2038?
questions.explanation: Ernst & Young (EY) made this projection in its August 2025 Economy Watch report.

questions.stem: Which new act passed in Parliament on August 11, 2025 provides a statutory framework for sports governance in India?
questions.explanation: The National Sports Governance Act, 2025 was passed by both houses in August 2025.

questions.stem: India’s cabinet approved a bid to host which multi-sport event in 2030?
questions.explanation: The cabinet approved India’s bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games in Ahmedabad.

questions.stem: What is the name of India’s first full-stack quantum computer launched under the National Quantum Mission?
questions.explanation: The QpiAI-Indus 25-qubit quantum computer was launched by startup QpiAI.

questions.stem: Which ministry finalized a 21-member national committee to launch India’s carbon market?
questions.explanation: The Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change finalized the committee.

options.text: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

questions.stem: Which state CM announced a 16-fold increase in the sports budget and plans to make Hyderabad a global sports hub?
questions.explanation: Telangana CM A. Revanth Reddy made the announcement at the Telangana Sports Hub meeting.

questions.stem: National Sports Day in India honors which legendary hockey player?
questions.explanation: It is celebrated on Major Dhyan Chand’s birthday, known as the 'Wizard of Hockey'.

questions.stem: Which state government released ₹4.9 crore in pending sports incentives to athletes on National Sports Day?
questions.explanation: The Andhra Pradesh government released the pending incentives.

questions.stem: Which stock index in India remained steady despite looming US tariffs, supported by forex reserves?
questions.explanation: The Nifty 50 index held steady, aided by strong reserves and RBI support.

questions.stem: Which city is hosting the two-day national conference of SC/ST welfare committees starting August 29, 2025?
questions.explanation: Bhubaneswar is hosting the conference of SC/ST welfare committee chairpersons.

questions.stem: Which country imposed 50% tariffs affecting Indian exports starting August 27, 2025?
questions.explanation: The United States confirmed the tariff, pressuring Indian exporters.

questions.stem: Which startup unveiled India’s 25-qubit quantum computer 'QpiAI-Indus'?
questions.explanation: The Bengaluru-based startup QpiAI unveiled the QpiAI-Indus under the National Quantum Mission.

questions.stem: Which department signed an MoU with QCI to enhance welfare services for military veterans?
questions.explanation: The Department of Ex-Servicemen Welfare signed the MoU with QCI.

questions.stem: Which new sports university was launched in Telangana under its global-sports-hub initiative?
questions.explanation: The Young India Sports University was launched under Telangana’s sports hub plan.

questions.stem: On National Sports Day 2025, which Prime Minister paid tribute to Major Dhyan Chand?
questions.explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi honored Dhyan Chand on National Sports Day.

questions.stem: What theme did Chhattisgarh adopt for National Sports Day celebrations?
questions.explanation: The theme was 'One hour, on the playground'.

questions.stem: India’s forex reserves helped stabilize the rupee amid tariff threats. True or false?
questions.explanation: True — reserves and RBI support kept rupee stable.

questions.stem: Who inaugurated the SC/ST welfare conference in Bhubaneswar on August 29, 2025?
questions.explanation: Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla inaugurated the event.

questions.stem: India deepened engagement with which two countries to balance pressure from US tariffs?
questions.explanation: India strengthened ties with China and Russia.
